mapper.update: create table `hbq_dic_info`( `field_name` varchar(200) primary key, `field_desc` varchar(500), `enum_type` varchar(100) )
create table `hbq_dic_ext_kv`( `field_name` varchar(200), `enum_key` varchar(500), `enum_value` varchar(500), primary key (field_name, enum_key) )
create table `hbq_dic_ext_sql`( `field_name` varchar(200) primary key, `enum_sql` varchar(500) )
